title: Sonitor® continues to lead the way in RTLS and IPS and is set to demonstrate its flagship Sense™ ultrasound-based RTLS and game-changing Forkbeard™ technology platform at the annual Cerner Health Conf
text:
GREENWICH, Conn. — Sonitor, the leading provider and innovator of ultrasound-based Real Time Location Systems (RTLS) and Indoor Positioning Systems (IPS) is once again set to delight current and prospective Cerner clients attending the Cerner Health Conference October 7-9, 2019 at the Kansas City Convention Center, Kansas City, MO. Sonitor will continue their proven track record of successful room, bay, bed and inch level live demonstrations on the show floor through their industry-leading accurate and efficient Sonitor Sense ultrasound-based RTLS and Forkbeard, their latest indoor positioning innovation.

Sonitor exhibiting and providing live demonstrations of Sonitor Sense and Forkbeard RTLS technology platforms

Sonitor’s Sense RTLS ‘set it and forget it’ platform delivers up to 99.9999% uptime, requires little or no routine tuning or optimization once installed and is the only ultrasound-based technology guaranteed to deliver the highest level of accuracy with significantly fewer devices than non-ultrasound based RTLS hardware. Forkbeard is Sonitor’s new, patented indoor positioning technology platform. Based on Fast Ultrasound Echo Location™ (FUEL™), leveraging acoustic reflections, and combined with BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy), Forkbeard overcomes the challenges many technology companies have encountered in delivering accurate and reliable indoor positioning of smartphones and other smart devices. By combining the power of Sense and Forkbeard technologies, Sonitor customers can maximize their indoor positioning and RLTS potential and deliver true value across the continuum of care.

“We are excited to be exhibiting at CHC19 and to be able to share our innovative platforms with Cerner and their clients. Cerner is a long-standing Sonitor partner and we have many shared clients with proven and successful integrations across multiple use cases. Every year we look forward to demonstrating the very best and innovative technology available in indoor positioning and to give clients hands on experience with our technology,” said Anne Bugge, President and CEO, Sonitor Technologies, Inc. “The Cerner Health Conference gives us a forum to engage with leading Healthcare facilities and to show, through live demonstration, how Sonitor’s technology platforms can help them lead the way in healthcare,” continued Ms. Bugge.

Come visit Sonitor at CHC19 from Oct. 7-9, in Booth 113.

About Sonitor

Sonitor® is the leading provider and innovator of accurate and reliable ultrasound-based Real Time Location Systems (RTLS) and Indoor Positioning Systems (IPS). The first and only company to use proprietary ultrasound technology as the primary technology for indoor positioning, Sonitor’s Sense™ and Forkbeard™ platforms work seamlessly together to help users accurately navigate indoor environments and determine the real-time location of people, smart devices (phones, laptop, tablets, etc.) and moveable equipment. Please visit www.sonitor.com for more information.
